events.message: I received my order last week but I want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected. Please let me know how to proceed.
The customer's message includes a refund request. Assigning cluster as Refund for case prioritization.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the item didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging? This will help us process your refund faster.
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 123456789, and the item is unopened in its original packaging.
Thanks for the details. We will initiate a refund to your original payment method once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Got the return label and appreciate your help. I will ship the item back today.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount back on your payment method within 5 business days.
Checking in to confirm that you received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund was credited to my account yesterday. Thanks again for your prompt assistance!
Closing this case now since the refund was completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to the customer’s email to gather feedback about their refund experience.
